CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Polymer films were casted from chlorobenzene solution with concentration of 8 mg mL -1 and all measurements were carried out under inert atmosphere.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| Polymer films |
| chlorobenzene solution |
| inert atmosphere |

In this paragraph, the "Material Name" entities are "Polymer films", "chlorobenzene solution", and "inert atmosphere".

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| Polymer films |

After re-evaluating the paragraph, the only clear "Material Name" entity is "Polymer films". The "chlorobenzene solution" is not a material name itself, but rather a solution containing a material, and "inert atmosphere" is a condition or environment rather than a material.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Polymer films were casted from chlorobenzene solution with concentration of 8 mg mL -1 and all measurements were carried out under inert atmosphere.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| 8 mg mL^-1 |
| inert atmosphere |

The two "Property Value" entities in the paragraph are:

1. "8 mg mL^-1": This is the concentration of the chlorobenzene solution from which the polymer films were casted.
2. "inert atmosphere": This refers to the condition under which all measurements were carried out.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| 8 mg mL^-1 |

The only clear "Value of material property" entity in the paragraph is:

1. "8 mg mL^-1": This is the concentration of the chlorobenzene solution from which the polymer films were casted.

The other entity, "inert atmosphere", does not clearly refer to a value of a material property, so it has been removed from the table.
